channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WIRED'S 2024 US Election Live Blog
item.description: Join us to keep up to date on everything related to the US presidential election.

item.title: Threads now has 275M monthly active users

item.title: Election Deniers Are Out in Full Force. We Went Where They Did
item.description: Vast networks of true believers, convinced beyond all reason that the last election was stolen, have spent years preparing to undermine this one. At l...

item.title: X updates block feature, letting blocked users see your public posts
item.description: X is rolling out its controversial update to the block feature, allowing people to view your public posts even if you have blocked them. © 2024 TechCr...

item.title: In Pews Across America, Evangelicals Are Told That God Wants Donald Trump

item.title: Tracking Elon Musk's Activities Over the Last Month Ahead of the Election
item.description: Over the last month, Elon Musk has put himself in position to take the credit for a Donald Trump win—or the blame for a loss.

item.title: Inside the Massive Crime Industry That’s Hacking Billion-Dollar Companies

item.title: Affirm launches in the UK as ‘buy now, pay later’ market faces regulatory overhaul
item.description: Buy now, pay later (BNPL) giant Affirm is launching in the U.K., its first market outside North America. Affirm’s long-anticipated arrival comes as U....

item.title: Vanguard cuts Indian ride-share startup Ola’s valuation to $2B
item.description: Vanguard has revised its valuation of Indian ride-hailing startup Ola to about $2 billion as of the end of August. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reser...

item.title: From Lime to Uber to Hertz: Free and discounted Election Day rides
